__data__.text:
Here  is  the  complete  text  content  for  a  Walmart  Application  Process  FAQ  file.  This  can  be  saved  as  a  .txt  document  for  reference  or  sharing:careers.walmart 
 
Frequently  Asked  Questions  
Application  Process  
Do  I  need  a  resume/CV  to  apply  to  all  jobs  at  Walmart?  
No,  for  hourly  roles  you  do  not  need  a  resume  or  CV,  but  you  must  share  your  job  history  and  highlights  on  the  application.  You  can  upload  a  resume  if  you  wish.careers.walmart 
On  average,  how  long  does  it  take  to  fill  out  an  
application?
 
Typically  15-20  minutes,  plus  20-30  minutes  for  any  required  assessments.  Further  applications  
are
 
faster
 
since
 
data
 
is
 
saved.
 
Not
 
all
 
roles
 
require
 
assessments;
 
some
 
require
 
additional
 ones.careers.walmart 
Can  I  stop  the  application  and  finish  later?  
Yes,  you  can  save  work  and  log  back  in  later  to  complete  the  application  via  "saved  drafts".careers.walmart 
Can  I  change  my  application  after  submitting?  
No,  applications  cannot  be  changed  post-submission.  Ensure  accuracy  before  submitting.careers.walmart 
Do  I  receive  confirmation  that  my  application  was  
received?
 
Yes,  a  screen  will  confirm  completion  once  all  steps  are  finished.careers.walmart

Timing  expectation  –  when  will  I  hear  back  after  I  apply?  
It  varies  based  on  the  roles  and  locations  selected.careers.walmart 
Will  I  be  informed  if  I  am  not  selected  for  an  interview?  
Yes,  notification  is  sent  if  not  selected  for  an  interview.careers.walmart 
If  I  don’t  receive  an  interview,  can  I  reapply  for  another  
position?
 
Yes,  the  application  remains  in  the  system  for  60  days  and  preferences  can  be  updated  within  that  period.careers.walmart 
Hourly  Position  Assistance  
What  is  the  hiring  process  for  stores  and  clubs?  
Detailed  information  is  available  on  each  step  of  the  process  for  stores  and  clubs.careers.walmart 
What  is  required  to  apply  for  a  job  at  Walmart  or  Sam's  
Club?
 
Minimum  age:  at  least  16  for  Walmart,  18  for  Sam’s  Club  (some  positions  require  18+);  prior  work  history  recommended.careers.walmart 
How  long  does  it  take  to  complete  an  application  for  
hourly
 
positions?
 
First-time:  15-20  minutes,  plus  assessment  time  if  required.  Further  applications  are  quicker.careers.walmart 
How  can  I  apply  for  an  hourly  position?  
See  the  Walmart  careers  website  for  hourly  application  instructions.careers.walmart

How  can  I  submit  an  application  for  Walmart  store  jobs?  
Navigate  to  the  hiring  center,  accept  the  disclaimer,  search  jobs,  create  an  account,  provide  details,  complete  the  assessment,  and  submit.careers.walmart 
How  can  I  find  a  Walmart  or  Sam's  Club  that  is  hiring?  
Use  the  store  and  club  hourly  roles  page  and  the  Walmart/Sam’s  Club  finder  tools.careers.walmart 
Can  I  apply  to  a  store  or  club  not  yet  open  or  not  
currently
 
hiring?
 
Hiring  for  new  stores  usually  starts  3-4  months  before  the  opening.  Check  main  pages  for  updates.careers.walmart 
Can  I  apply  to  multiple  stores  in  my  area?  
Yes,  select  multiple  locations  during  the  application  process.careers.walmart 
How  can  I  apply  to  work  in  a  Distribution  Center?  
Career  opportunities  for  Distribution  Centers  are  listed  on  the  careers  website.careers.walmart 
Will  I  receive  notification  if  I’m  not  being  considered  for  a  
store
 
or
 
club
 
position?
 
Applications  remain  active  for  60  days.  No  notification  is  sent  if  not  selected  or  if  the  job  is  filled.careers.walmart 
How  can  I  contact  someone  for  more  assistance?  
Contact  the  candidate  help  line  at  800-955-7267,  M-F  7am-4pm  CST.careers.walmart 
Salaried  Position  Assistance  
Where  are  Walmart  and  Sam’s  Club  corporate  offices?

Main  office:  Bentonville,  Arkansas.  Additional  tech  offices,  distribution,  and  call  centers  nationwide.careers.walmart 
How  can  I  apply  for  a  salaried  position?  
Follow  instructions  on  the  Walmart  careers  site  for  management  and  corporate  office  roles.careers.walmart 
Can  I  apply  online  before  a  position  is  posted?  
No,  applications  are  only  accepted  after  posting.careers.walmart 
How  do  I  request  reasonable  accommodation?  
For  store  roles,  contact  the  store  personnel  office;  for  salaried  roles,  discuss  with  a  recruiter  when  contacted.careers.walmart 
What  if  I  am  an  international  candidate?  
Walmart  provides  sponsorship  for  specialized  roles  under  IRCA  regulations.careers.walmart 
Are  unsolicited  search  firm  submissions  accepted?  
No,  such  submissions  are  ineligible  for  review.careers.walmart 
Technology  Assistance  
Recommended  Internet  Browsers?  
Google  Chrome  12+  is  best;  also  works  with  Firefox  115+,  Edge  44+,  Safari  5.0+.careers.walmart 
Recommended  resume  formats  and  sizes?  
Max  5MB  per  attachment,  max  5  attachments;  accepted  formats:  .avi,  .bmp,  .csv,  .doc,  .gif,  
.htm,
 
.html,
 
.jpg,
 
.mov,
 
.mp3,
 
.mp4,
 
.mpeg,
 
.mpg,
 
.ppt,
 
.pdf,
 
.rtf,
 
.swf,
 
.tif,
 
.txt,
 
.wmv,
 
.xls,
 
.xml,
 .docx,  .pptx,  .xlsx.careers.walmart

Forgot  password  for  Home  Office,  Transportation,  Field  
Management
 
Roles?
 
Use  "Forgot  your  password?"  link  and  follow  on-screen  instructions.careers.walmart 
Forgot  password  for  store  job  application?  
Create  a  new  username/password,  enter  personal  info  before  resetting.  If  account  is  locked,  use  a  new  email.careers.walmart 
How  to  reset  PIN  for  Hourly  Positions?  
Visit  Walmart,  Sam’s  Club,  or  Distribution  Center  with  photo  ID  and  request  PIN  lookup.careers.walmart 
What  if  my  sign-in  email  is  not  active?  
Create  another  profile  with  a  new  email,  re-upload  info.careers.walmart 
Can  I  create  a  profile  with  a  different  email?  
Yes,  but  information  must  be  re-uploaded.careers.walmart 
No  computer  access?  
No  paper  applications  accepted  for  hourly  positions;  visit  a  library  or  workforce  center  for  internet  access.careers.walmart 
Security  
How  is  personal  information  protected?  
Minimal  paper  processing.  Data  is  in  applicant  tracking  systems  (ATS)  accessible  only  by  authorized  personnel;  high  security  standards  maintained.careers.walmart 
How  to  protect  yourself  when  using  public  computers?

Use  secure  login,  do  not  save  files,  clear  history,  cookies,  and  close  browser  after  application.careers.walmart 
How  to  verify  legitimate  Walmart  recruiter  contact?  
Walmart  will  never  ask  for  money.  Contacts  only  from  authorized  @walmart.com,  @wal-mart.com,  or  @samsclub.com  addresses.careers.walmart 
Opportunities  
How  to  search  for  best  opportunities?  
Use  career  area  and  location  filters  on  the  search  page.careers.walmart 
Existing  Walmart/Sam’s  Club  Associates  
Current  associates  apply  through  WalmartOne.  Former  associates  apply  as  new  candidates,  indicating  former  employment  in  application.careers.walmart 
Job  alerts  and  sharing  jobs  
Sign  up  for  alerts  and  share  jobs  via  social  media  or  email  from  the  job  description  page.careers.walmart 
Recruiter  Tips  
How  to  answer  interview  questions  about  
strengths/weaknesses?
 
Give  specific  examples  and  be  honest  about  weaknesses  with  improvement  details.careers.walmart 
Advice  for  professionals  switching  fields?  
Consider  the  impact  on  career  trajectory;  start  at  entry-level  if  changing  fields.  Be  passionate  about  your  new  choice.careers.walmart 
What  to  include  in  a  cover  letter?

Make  strong,  persuasive  connections  between  qualifications  and  requirements.careers.walmart 
Tips  for  networking?  
Seek  individuals  with  skills  to  learn  from;  support  each  other's  career  growth.careers.walmart 
What  questions  stand  out  in  interviews?  
Ask  about  team  strengths,  advice  for  success,  and  open  skill  needs.careers.walmart 
 
This  content  is  fully  ready  for  saving  as  a  plain  text  FAQ  document  about  the  Walmart  application  process.careers.walmart 
1.  https://careers.walmart.com/faqs
